parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the time-based schedule.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the time-based schedule. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: FlowName
parameters.description: The name of the workflow that is associated with the time-based schedule.

parameters.name: Payload
parameters.description: The trigger message of the time-based schedule. Specify the value in the JSON format.

parameters.name: ScheduleName
parameters.description:
The name of the time-based schedule. The name must meet the following conventions:

*   The name can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).
*   The name must start with a letter or an underscore (\_).
*   It is case-sensitive.
*   The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length.
